mapper.select: SELECT l.name, l.url, l.brief FROM link l ORDER BY ISNULL(l.order_id), l.order_id, l.id DESC
SELECT l.name, l.url, l.brief, l.order_id AS orderId, l.id, l.create_time AS createTime, l.update_time AS updateTime FROM link l ORDER BY ISNULL(l.order_id), l.order_id, l.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO link (name, url, brief, order_id) VALUES (#{add.name}, #{add.url}, #{add.brief}, #{add.orderId})
mapper.update: UPDATE link SET name = #{up.name}, url = #{up.url}, brief = #{up.brief}, order_id = #{up.orderId} WHERE id = #{up.id}
